First Party Collection/Use: We may collect personal data as follows: Your contact details, when you register for our Service, sign up for our mailing list, or otherwise communicate with us; this information may include your name, email address, and phone number.
We use personal data for the following purposes or as otherwise described at the time of collection: To provide the Service and perform our contract with you under our Terms of Service...
We collect information from Superhuman product features, including the content of drafts or snippets you create in the Service and read receipts.
Third Party Sharing/Collection: We may disclose personal data to service providers, including hosting, debugging services, email and productivity services, survey providers...
We may also share information about our users with these companies to facilitate advertising for our Service to them or similar users on other online platforms.
User Access/Edit/Deletion: Depending on your location and the nature of your interactions with our Service, you may request the following in relation to your personal data: Access to a copy of the personal data that we have collected about you.
You should contact the business customer directly to access, correct or request deletion of your personal data.
Data Retention: We keep personal data for as long as reasonably necessary for the purposes described in this Privacy Policy, in accordance with our retention policies...
Data Security: We have implemented safeguards designed to be consistent with industry standards to protect personal data from loss, misuse, and unauthorized access...
International/Specific Audiences: Our Service is not directed to children who are under the age of 16. Superhuman does not knowingly collect personal data from children under the age of 16.
Superhuman complies with EU-U.S. Data Privacy Framework and intends to comply with the forthcoming UK Extension of the EU-U.S. Data Privacy Framework...
Do Not Track: Some Internet browsers can be configured to send 'Do Not Track' signals to the online services that you visit. We currently do not respond to 'Do Not Track' or similar signals.
Policy Change: We reserve the right to modify this Privacy Policy at any time. When we do we will post an updated version on this page...
User Choice/Control: You may opt out of marketing-related emails and other communications by following the opt-out or unsubscribe instructions in the communications you receive from us...
You can opt-out of third-party cookies as described in our Cookie Policy.
Introductory/Generic: Welcome to Superhuman, a service provided by Superhuman Labs, Inc. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, disclose, and otherwise process personal data...
Privacy contact information: If you have any questions about our Privacy Policy or the information practices of the Site, please feel free to contact us by email at privacy@superhuman.com.
